name: Baby,
greetingText: Welcome to the first part of your birthday present!
wishText: Soon, your birthday won't be the only anniversary to celebrate!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday, my darling!  I hope you're having an incredible day!  I love you so so so much and I can't wait to marry you!
text2: That's what I was going to do...
text3: But that would've been pretty lame...
text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
